mode.title: Network Mode
mode.description: Control how muckrake connects to the internet. The default mode routes all traffic through Tor with Snowflake for maximum privacy and censorship resistance.
mode.label: Connection Mode
mode.hint: Snowflake uses WebRTC to bypass censorship. Recommended for most users.
mode.unsafeWarning: Warning: Direct connections expose your IP address and location. Only use this for local development or when you fully understand the risks.

torProvider.title: Tor Connection
torProvider.description: Choose how muckrake connects to Tor. The system will try each option in order until one works.
torProvider.label: Preferred Provider
torProvider.hint: Most users should leave the defaults. Tor Browser Proxy is useful if you already have Tor Browser running.

bypass.title: Bypass Domains
bypass.description: Domains that should connect directly without going through Tor. Use sparingly - only for localhost or trusted internal services.

storage.title: Storage
storage.description: Configure database and file storage settings.

recentProjects.title: Recent Projects
recentProjects.label: Remember recent projects
recentProjects.hint: Disabled by default for your safety. Stores project names locally in your browser.

warning.title: Security Warning
warning.message: Enabling this feature will store the names of projects you open in your browser's local storage. This data could be discovered by anyone with access to your computer or browser. If you are working on sensitive investigations, we strongly recommend keeping this feature disabled.

openProject.title: Open Project
openProject.description: Open a folder as a project. If the folder doesn't contain a project database, one will be created.
openProject.hint: The folder will contain your project's database and any associated files.

saveWorkspace.title: Save Workspace
saveWorkspace.description: Download your workspace configuration. This file contains a list of your open projects and can be used to restore your session later.

openWorkspace.title: Open Workspace
openWorkspace.description: Select a workspace file (.mkspc) to open. This will open all projects listed in the workspace.
openWorkspace.descriptionRemote: Browse the server to find a workspace file (.mkspc) to open.
